page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN FORDYCE AREA
page.content: In the district around Fordyce,the residents are mainly employed in farming as farm workers,tenant farmers or farm owners.In the Village, people of working age mostly travel to work in Banff,Buckie or Cullen.Many young persons have to move away from the area to find employment.There are quite a few retired people living in the village.Apart from farming,the following businesses provide work for people: l.Seivwright Bros.(Contractors)Hillend 2.A.Brown (Joiner) The Brae,Fordyce 3.I.Hutcheson(Decorator)Hallow Fair 4.The Hawthorne Restaurant,Church St. The School uses one Caretaker,one Meals Assistant and one Bus Driver who are local,but the two full-time teachers come in daily from Macduff.
